name: Environmental Services Association
goal:
The Environmental Services Association is the UK's trade association for companies providing recycling, waste, secondary resource management, and associated environmental services to people and businesses.

Our Members provide essential waste and secondary resources management services to the public and private sectors.

We are working with governments, Parliaments and regulators to bring about a sustainable system of waste management for the UK.

Vision
To deliver a circular economy in the United Kingdom.

Purpose
To drive higher operational standards in the UK's recycling and waste industry, protecting the environment, our workforce and the public.
To work with policy makers and politicians to ensure that recycling and waste policy, legislation and regulation supports the investment we need to realise a more circular economy.
To decarbonise the recycling and waste industry in the UK.
